00019 #ifndef _FFT_ACTION_FSK_STRENGTH_HPP_cm101118_
00020 #define _FFT_ACTION_FSK_STRENGTH_HPP_cm101118_
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/make_shared.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00031 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/SpectrumPeak.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/Calibration.hpp"
00033 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/CalibratedSpectrumPeak.hpp"
00034 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/SpectrumPowerInInterval.hpp"
00035 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/FSKStrength.hpp"
00036 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/PowerSpectrumLine.hpp"
00037 #include "FFTProcessor/Proxy.hpp"
00038 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/SpectrumInterval.hpp"
00039 
00040 namespace Action {
00041   class FSKStrength : public SpectrumInterval {
00042   public:
00043     FSKStrength(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00044       : SpectrumInterval(addKeysToConfig(config,
00045                                          config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fRef_Hz"),
00046                                          config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fShift_Hz")))
00047       , fRef_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fRef_Hz"))
00048       , fShift_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fShift_Hz"))
00049       , minRatio_dB_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.minRatio_db")) {
00050       name_ = "FSKStrength";
00051     }
00052 
00053     virtual ~FSKStrength() {}
00054     virtual void proc(Proxy::Base& p, 
00055                       const SpectrumBase& s,
00056                       const PowerSpectrum& ps) {
00057       try {
00058         const Proxy::Base::ptime t(p.getApproxPTime());
00059         Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle
00060           sppRef((useCalibration())
00061                  ? boost::make_shared<Result::CalibratedSpectrumPeak>
00062                  (t, fRef_-fShift_, boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Result::Calibration>(p.getResult(calibrationKey())))
00063                  : boost::make_shared<Result::SpectrumPeak>(t, fRef_-fShift_));
00064 
00065         Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle
00066           sppShift((useCalibration())
00067                    ? boost::make_shared<Result::CalibratedSpectrumPeak>
00068                    (t, fRef_+fShift_, boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Result::Calibration>(p.getResult(calibrationKey())))
00069                    : boost::make_shared<Result::SpectrumPeak>(t, fRef_+fShift_));
00070 
00071         Result::SpectrumPowerInInterval::Handle
00072           spiRef((useCalibration())
00073                  ? boost::make_shared<Result::CalibratedSpectrumPowerInInterval>
00074                  (t, fRef_+1.5*fShift_, 0.25*fShift_, s.normWindow(),
00075                     boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Result::Calibration>(p.getResult(calibrationKey())))
00076                  : boost::make_shared<Result::SpectrumPowerInInterval>(t, fRef_+1.5*fShift_, 0.25*fShift_, s.normWindow()));
00077         
00078         sppRef->findPeak  (p, s, ps, fRef_+0.5*fShift_, fRef_+1.5*fShift_, 1.0);
00079         sppShift->findPeak(p, s, ps, fRef_-1.5*fShift_, fRef_-0.5*fShift_, 1.0);
00080         spiRef->proc(p, ps);
00081 
00082         const double strengthFSK(sppRef->strength() + sppShift->strength());
00083         const double strengthBackground(spiRef->strength());
00084 
00085         if (strengthFSK - strengthBackground > minRatio_dB_)
00086           p.putResult(resultKey(),
00087                       Result::FFTResultFSKStrength::Handle
00088                       (new Result::FFTResultFSKStrength(t, sppRef, sppShift, spiRef)));        
00089         if (plotSpectrum())
00090           p.putResult(resultKey()+"_plot",
00091                       boost::make_shared<Result::PowerSpectrumLine>(t, ps));
00092       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00093         LOG_WARNING(e.what());
00094       }
00095     }
00096   private:
00097     // add keys "<xmlattr>.f{Min,Max}_Hz"
00098     static boost::property_tree::ptree addKeysToConfig(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config,
00099                                                        double fRef,
00100                                                        double fShift) {
00101       boost::property_tree::ptree result(config);
00102       result.put("<xmlattr>.fMin_Hz", boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(fRef-2*fShift));
00103       result.put("<xmlattr>.fMax_Hz", boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(fRef+2*fShift));
00104       return result;
00105     }
00106     const double fRef_;            // nominal (mark) frequency / Hz
00107     const double fShift_;          // shift frequency / Hz
00108     const double minRatio_dB_;        // min. ratio peak/background
00109   } ;
00110 } // namespace Action
00111 
00112 #endif // _FFT_ACTION_FSK_STRENGTH_HPP_cm101118_
